title: Gain Flings, Fireworks and Dryer Sheets | Gain
description: Gain Flings, Fireworks and Dryer Sheets

asset.title: Gain Flings, Fireworks and Dryer Sheets | Gain
asset.description: Gain Flings, Fireworks and Dryer Sheets
asset.author: Gain

transcripts: [Music] I've had so many of my close friends come up to me and tell me your clothes smell amazing what do you use I use a gain combo I used to gain packs I use to gain fireworks and the dryer sheets the scent is amazing it really is amazing and it last for a very long time I washed it about two weeks ago and it still smells like I just washed it yesterday. I think the gain fireworks product is genius I love the long-lasting smell of all of our laundry now like everything smells so good and then for the drier I will just use the gain dryer sheets and your clothes smell absolutely amazing and it lasts so long and oh my goodness you guys this regimen is perfect it's so simple, but my laundry always ends up smelling so fresh and almost like new. You know how much I love gain it is no secret very simple very easy but again it gives me that long lasting freshness when I put them in my linen closet and I take my showers I know that our towels are guaranteed to smell fresh and to be clean. [Music]
